snippet.title: Fire and Fear Update New Maps,  New Characters + Grenades
snippet.description:
Two Brand New Maps!

Only for the brave, take on an elite operation in an old Zombie infested Sanatorium in this brand new Zombie mode map. Once inside, creep through the dark lit corridors, take cover behind old equipment, operating tables, beds, and see if you can make it to the extraction point as a team. Working closely together is the only way you’ll have a chance of making it out alive.

Next, welcome to Dojo where some come to train and where others come to show off their skills in this all new multiplayer map. Located in an eastern Asian town, find cover under falling cherry blossoms, hide behind training dummies and show the world who is the true sensei and master. 

Easter Egg Hunt - Two New Unlockable Characters

The update includes two new characters that can be unlocked via the new Zombie map. One character can be unlocked solo, the second requires a full squad and is quite hidden. We'll pick 3 people who found the second easter egg in the first 2 weeks to give an Alvo t-shirt to. Happy Hunting!

Full Changelog: https://bit.ly/AlvoFFUpdate

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/p8F9rAVPnP
